channel.title: I get this error when i do ::banuser
channel.description:
when i try and ban sum1 i get this error -->
[client-2-ash 2oo8]: playerCommand: banuser lol java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Documents and Settings\Jordan.pimp\My Documents\my server stuff\admin .txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.(FileOutputStream.java:177) at java.io.FileOutputStream.(FileOutputStream.java:102) at java.io.FileWriter.(FileWriter.java:61) at client.customCommand(client.java:13050) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:23706) at client.packetProcess(client.java:19044) at client.packetSending(client.java:18997) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:49)
any1 get this error when they ::banuser [legend-scape]? or sumthink like that

item.title: I get this error when i do ::banuser
item.dc:creator: @_James_scape _James_scape
item.description:
@_James_scape wrote:

java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Documents and Settings\Jordan.pimp\My Documents\my server stuff\admin .txt

try this…

C:/Documents and Settings/Jordan.pimp/My Documents/my server stuff/adminpk/banlogs.txt

then compile it…

Read full topic
